id.description: id of the activity, can be assumed to be globally unique. Some activities such as a Follow request will require an id to be valid. Servers may assume an id to be required. As assigning an id is 'trivial', one should assign one.

to.description: Array of actors this activity is addressed to. It is sane to assume that an activity is addressed to at least one person.

cc.description: Array of actors this activity is carbon copied to.

published.description: Moment of this activity being published

type.description: Type of the activity. Side effects of this activity are determine by this type.
